qas.question: What is the capital of the Marshall Islands?
On what day in 2008 did the Marshall Island government declare a state of emergency?
In meters, how high were the 2008 floods?
In what year did waves overcome the walls of the capital city?

context: In 2008, <a3_0>extreme waves and high tides<a3_0/> caused widespread flooding in the capital city of <a0_0>Majuro<a0_0/> and other urban centres, 3 feet (<a2_0>0.91<a2_0/> m) above sea level. On <a1_0>Christmas<a1_0/> morning in 2008, the government declared a state of emergency. In <a4_0>2013<a4_0/>, heavy waves once again breached the city walls of Majuro.
